types.html:
la faire longue

  1. (informal) to stay long, to stay for long; to stay up late; to party all night, to party until all hours
    Je ne vais pas la faire longue, je dois me lever tôt demain. ― I won't stay long, I have to get up early tomorrow.

Usage notes

[edit]
  • Used only in negative constructions: ne pas la faire longue.
